verbs.description: This week on " [V: Face] [ARG1: the Nation] , " moderator Margaret Brennan interviews President Trump 's new National Security Adviser John Bolton , Representative Trey Gowdy , and President Obama ’s Homeland Security Secretary Jeh Johnson . Plus , our political panel gives analysis on developments in Washington .

[ARGM-TMP: This week] on " Face the Nation , " moderator Margaret Brennan interviews President Trump 's new National Security Adviser John Bolton , Representative Trey Gowdy , and President Obama ’s Homeland Security Secretary Jeh Johnson . Plus , [ARG0: our political panel] [V: gives] [ARG1: analysis on developments in Washington] .
